channel.title: [help] server
channel.description: ok basicaly i forgot alot of stuff anyone kno how to change the co-ordinate of home?

item.title: [help] server
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“mister G, post:8, topic:249927”]IN deltascape go to players.java
press CTRL+F and serech for “initial”
It should say //initial X and Y coordinates of the player
somthing like that!

then under that it says hight=0 (dont worry about that)
this is what it should look like:

	// initial x and y coordinates of the player
	heightLevel = 0;
	// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper
	// initialization packet
	toX = 3088+misc.random(3);
	toY = 3495+misc.random(3);

just change the toX and toY to the coord u want.
leave misc.random(3) alone(DONT TOUCH)
that coord there is edgeville!

GOODLUCK message me if more QUESTIONS![/quote]

He’s already done what he created this thread for.

Read full topic

item.title: [help] server
item.dc:creator: @mister_G mister G
item.description:
@mister_G wrote:

IN deltascape go to players.java
press CTRL+F and serech for “initial”
It should say //initial X and Y coordinates of the player
somthing like that!

then under that it says hight=0 (dont worry about that)
this is what it should look like:

// initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper // initialization packet toX = 3088+misc.random(3); toY = 3495+misc.random(3);

just change the toX and toY to the coord u want.
leave misc.random(3) alone(DONT TOUCH)
that coord there is edgeville!

GOODLUCK message me if more QUESTIONS!

Read full topic
